## MarkdownRenderer.renderMarkdown() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> - use [MarkdownRenderer.render()](obsidian.MarkdownRenderer.render.md)

Renders markdown string to an HTML element.

**Signature:**

